H0.text: According to the Old Testament of the Bible who was the brother of Moses. Abraham

H1.text: According to the Old Testament of the Bible who was the brother of Moses. Isaac

H2.text: According to the Old Testament of the Bible who was the brother of Moses. Jacob

H3.text: According to the Old Testament of the Bible who was the brother of Moses. AARON

A4.text: Aaron was an Israelite prophet, high priest, and the elder brother of Moses.
